generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: On the left side of the road, there is a paved area bordered by trees and a curb, which is designated for pedestrians and cyclists, fitting the definition of a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line the right side of the road, clearly identifiable as buildings.
- vegetation: Numerous tall trees with green leaves are visible along both sides of the road, which qualifies as vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a bright, open sky with some clouds and thin wires, fitting the definition of sky.
- person: A person wearing a red shirt can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and at least one car is visible in the foreground, indicating the presence of cars.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign and a circular parking sign are visible on the right side of the road, attached to poles, which are traffic signs.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the road, supporting traffic signs and other fixtures, which are poles.
